taglineDescription: Connect with sports enthusiasts in your area. Organize and join sports activities with like-minded people.
howItWorksDescription: Simple steps to get you playing your favorite sports
createOrJoinDescription: Create your own sports event or join existing ones in your area.
meetUpDescription: Connect with other players at the specified location and time.
playAndConnectDescription: Enjoy your favorite sports and make new friends along the way.
beFirstToCreateEvent: Be the first to create a sports event!
readyToFindBuddies: Ready to Find Your Sports Buddies?
readyToFindBuddiesDescription: Join our community today and never miss out on your favorite sports activities again.
footerDescription: Connect with sports enthusiasts in your area. Organize and join sports activities easily.
loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your SportsMeetup dashboard.
createAccountDescription: Enter your details to create your SportsMeetup account
eventCreatedDescription: Your sports event has been successfully created.
termsAndPrivacy: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
verificationEmailSentDescription: In a real app, an email would be sent. For now, proceed to login. Your account will be auto-verified on first login for demo purposes.
accountAutoVerifiedDescription: Your account has been verified for this demo.
loggedOutDescription: You have been successfully logged out.
emailVerifiedDescription: Your email has been successfully verified.
profileUpdatedDescription: Your profile has been successfully updated.
currentPasswordRequired: Current password is required to set a new password
newPasswordMinLength: New password must be at least 6 characters long
verificationLinkSent: A verification link has been (simulated) sent to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to activate your account.
ifNoEmail: If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder.
pageNotFoundDescription: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist. It might have been moved or deleted.
noEventsCreated: You haven't created any events yet.
noEventsJoined: You haven't joined any events yet.
noEventsAvailable: No events available at the moment.
checkBackLater: Check back later or create your own!
confirmDeleteEventDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this event? This action cannot be undone.
createEventPageDescription: Fill in the details below to organize your sports activity.
descriptionPlaceholder: Provide details about the event, skill level, etc.
consentShareWithHost: Share my gender and age group with the event organizer
